entries.text: Thank you for calling VeloFit customer support. My name is Alex. How can I help you today?
Hi Alex, I'd like to return some shoes and a pair of tires I recently purchased.
Okay, I can help with that. Can you provide your order number, please?

Thanks. Let me pull up your order. Okay, I see the shoes and tires here. Before we proceed with the return, can you confirm whether either the shoes or tires were ever mounted or installed on your bike?
Yes, I did mount the tires to my wheels and I also installed the cleats on the shoes and used them for a couple of rides.

I understand. Unfortunately, because the tires were mounted, and the shoes show evidence of use, we are unable to accept the return. Items that have been installed and used, like tires that have been on a rim and shoes that have been ridden in, cannot be returned. In your case, the tires are considered used because of the fact that they were mounted to wheels. The shoes, being ridden in, will have cleat marks on the soles, and would no longer be considered new. Similarly, your tires likely have dirty tires and we cannot resell them as new. We only accept returns for items in brand new, unused condition.
Oh, I didn't realize that. I thought I could try them out and return them if they didn't fit or work for me.

I apologize for the inconvenience. Our return policy, which is available on our website, specifies that mounted or used items are not eligible for return. We encourage customers to thoroughly research products and sizing charts before making a purchase, or consult with our expert staff via phone or chat for personalized recommendations to ensure the best fit and performance for your needs. We also suggest taking advantage of our fit guarantee on select items.
Okay, I understand. That's disappointing, but I appreciate you explaining the policy to me.
You're welcome. Is there anything else I can assist you with today? Perhaps I can help you find some accessories that might improve your riding experience?
No, that's okay. Thanks for your help, Alex.
You're very welcome! Have a great day, and thanks for choosing VeloFit!
